Sentencas: In this study, Erbium and Ytterbium doped Bismuth based electrolyte was investigated for the solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Synthesis and structure analysis of new type Er and Yb doped bismuth oxide solid electrolytes

Sentencas: Yb2O3 and Er2O3 oxides were doped into the Bi2O3 compound using solid-state reaction method in (Er2O3)(x)(Yb2O3)(y)(Bi2O3)(1-x-y) stoichiometric ratio (x= 2, 4, 6, 8 mol% and y = 5, 10, 15, 20 mol%).
Titulo: Synthesis and structure analysis of new type Er and Yb doped bismuth oxide solid electrolytes

Sentencas: Investigations were carried out for 700 degrees C, 750 degrees C, 800 degrees C sintering temperatures, respectively.
Titulo: Synthesis and structure analysis of new type Er and Yb doped bismuth oxide solid electrolytes

Sentencas: Structural characterization was carried out using X-ray powder diffraction (XRD), and stable face-centred cubic crystal phase (delta-phase) was successfully obtained in all samples containing more than 12 mol% dopant.
Titulo: Synthesis and structure analysis of new type Er and Yb doped bismuth oxide solid electrolytes

Sentencas: When the variation of the lattice parameters according to the total addition rate is examined, it is observed that as the additive content increases, lattice parameters also become larger.
Titulo: Synthesis and structure analysis of new type Er and Yb doped bismuth oxide solid electrolytes

Sentencas: Differential Thermal Analysis (DTA) showed that all samples were thermally stable and phase transformation was not observed below 1000 degrees C.
Titulo: Synthesis and structure analysis of new type Er and Yb doped bismuth oxide solid electrolytes

Sentencas: The porosity of pellets was analysed from their surface images taken via Scanning Electron Microscopy (SEM), and these results showed an increase in porosity with increasing dopant content.
Titulo: Synthesis and structure analysis of new type Er and Yb doped bismuth oxide solid electrolytes

Sentencas: Total conductivities of electrolytes were measured by Four-Point Probe technique (4PPT), and temperature dependency of conductivity was investigated.
Titulo: Synthesis and structure analysis of new type Er and Yb doped bismuth oxide solid electrolytes

Sentencas: The single delta-phase ErYbSB-15 sample was found to have highest conductivity (similar to 5 x 10(-2 )Scm(-1) at 560 degrees C).
Titulo: Synthesis and structure analysis of new type Er and Yb doped bismuth oxide solid electrolytes

Sentencas: This conductivity value is higher than the conductivity of 20 mol% Erbium doped bismuth oxide previously known as the highest conductivity value of doped Bismuth oxide based electroceramics given in the literature.
Titulo: Synthesis and structure analysis of new type Er and Yb doped bismuth oxide solid electrolytes
Synthesis and structure analysis of new type Er and Yb doped bismuth oxide solid electrolytes
